field.label: URI
field.helpText: The URI to the Pravega controller in the form tcp://host:port

field.label: Scope
field.helpText: The Pravega scope containing the data stream.

field.label: Stream Name
field.helpText: The name of the data stream.

field.label: Create Scope
field.helpText: When checked, Pravega scope will be automatically created. Only enable this if Pravega is running in stand-alone mode.

field.label: Pravega Authentication Required
field.helpText: Indicates whether authentication is required for Pravega.

field.label: Pravega Reader Group
field.helpText: The name of the reader group for this reader within Pravega. Naming the reader group will maintain the reader's position in the stream. Note: multiple readers sharing the same reader group will never see the same event twice. If different readers each need to process all events in the stream, they should use different reader groups.

field.label: Read Timeout (ms)
field.helpText: The maximum amount of time the reader will wait for a response from Pravega.

field.label: Routing Key Type
field.helpText: The type of routing key to use for each event. "Fixed" means to use the literal value of the Routing Key below. "JsonReference" means the event data is JSON and the value will be extracted from the body using the Routing Key below as a JSON reference (i.e. a value of "myVar" will look for the "myVar" key in the JSON of each event, and use its corresponding value as the routing key for that event).

field.label: Routing Key
field.helpText: The routing key to use for each event written to the stream. If the Routing Key Type is "Fixed", this value will be used literally and will be the same for every event. If the Routing Key Type is "JsonReference", the routing key for each event will be evaluated from the JSON body, using the reference provided here.
